Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Look of quality not matched by performance
Item.Review:
Pros: Design and fit
Cons: Quality of sound
I purchased these headphones for use with my electronic drums. I was replacing a very expensive set of headphones that my lovely son decided it would be a good idea to break in half. After reading some reviews of these headphones I decided why spend the ton of money required to replace my old headphones when I could just purchase these.
You get what you pay for, unfortunately with these you are getting a great look but not really getting great performance. Specifically, I feel they lack the range I'm used to in terms of hitting higher treb notes and low bass tones. It kind of seems as if I am listening to my old headphones with cotton balls in my ears.
I've given the headphones to my son to use for watching movies and ... such on the iPad. Hey, a 2 1/2 year old doesn't mind how they work! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: great headphones for on the go
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to wear, sounds great, and great price
Cons: if you look down they slide off of head
these headphones have great bass and fit very snug! the sound is very sharp and very good quality! you wont go wrong with this pair.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent Budget Headphones for Casual Listeners
Item.Review:
Pros: Excellent price, the design and quality, and great sound.
Cons: Personally, the cord is short.
There are 3 things I like about these Headphones:
1) The price 2) The slim and swivel design 3) The Sensitivity
I bought these headphones to listen to movies and music because the punch of the bass on my sound system is so strong, it would annoy everyone in the house. The price is unmatchable for the performance it delivers with style and comfort. The headphone for the right ear is marked with a red band for quick locating so I don't have to look for "L" or "R" markings. The padded earphones swivel to make a more comfortable fit.
The sound it delivers is outstanding for a headphone of this price. It has a Sentivity of 100db/mW. Vocals and songs come ... out very clear; in fact I could not detect any distortion unlike my sound system, which is another reason why I use this for movies and songs on my PC. While watching movies, the deep bass does not overpower soft voices and I can listen with comfort without adjusting the volume. These headphones supplies adequate sound frequencies at all levels. I adjust the volume with my PC's volume control; but even this little shortcoming could not undermine the fact that these are excellent headphones for the budget shoppers.
The only thing I wish it could have is a longer cord (the cord is 47 1/4" but I like to lay back and listen) and volume control... But then Sony would triple the price. : ( expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Amazing sound quality for such cheap price
Item.Review:
Pros: comfortable, great sound quality, really cheap
Cons: none yet
I am very picky about headphones, especially concerning the sound quality. however, i tend to break my headphones within a year, so i can never invest in Bose or Beats by Dr Dre. This headphone is a great fit for me. since i love rock and electronic, great clarity and heavy bass in headphones are important for me. i've gone through a lot of brands of headphones and this product is definitely one of my favorites in term of sound quality. it makes every song i listen to sound so much better. it is a really comfortable fit on my ears, i can wear it for hours without feeling pain. most importantly, it is super cheap, especially for a headphone with such great sound quality. most people complains that the ... cord is too short. but it's actually perfect for me because i hate untangling the cords every time i use these devices. i am not sure of its durability since i just bought it. but even if it breaks, i'll still buy it again. definitely worth it. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Great over ear headphones for cheap
Item.Review:
Pros: Comfort, sound quality, no battery needed, descent bass
Cons: seems fragile, short cord
I purchased the Sony noise cancellation headphones for 2.5x more price just before purchasing these. I did like the cancellation feature, clear treble, only almost no bass, and noise cancellation required use of battery. These were just for me, with really good treble/bass distinction, short cord since it's for portable device (not recommend for receiver connection since I believe it has less than 40mm drivers). Comfortable and folds slightly for travel. For $20 not a bad deal or great for kids.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Cheap, reliable
Cons: Lows and Highs
Wow, the reviewers giving these headphones anything over 3 stars in Sound quality have gone complete mental! Sony always makes reliable headphones. For $20 you will have a pair of headphones that will last you a long time and sleek looking. However, sound quality isn't the best at all. Lack of Bass and Highs. They are somewhat comfortable. Overall, save a few more $$ to get something better.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Best headphones for a low price!
Item.Review:
Pros: Lightweight, Stylish, Good Sound Quality
Cons: Nothing
These headphones are the best I've ever owned! They fit perfectly, have great bass, and isolate the sound.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Comfortable; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Great Sound Quality
I found that the Sony Headphones at a great price and love the sound. I use it on my ipod mostly. Works great with computers, laptops and ipads. Especially when you are sharing space with others. You can be curtious and have your music to yourself.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Product Review for Sony MDR-ZX100 Headphone - Stereo - Black - Mini-phone
Item.Review: These are the beast stereo headphones i ever had. When i first bought these, they were stylish, and a good price. I was afraid the bass was terrible but it was magnificent.I had these headphones last year and they still work. I recommend for you to buy this.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Can't beat them at that price
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, portable, sound quality, cord, comfort
Cons: Nothing really
I got these for $20 and they're worth every penny. They fold so they're portable, the cord to this day hasn't tangled even when being shuffled around in a backpack. Build quality seems pretty solid though I'm careful with my electronics. Very comfortable to wear for long hours.
Sound quality is decent, nothing an audiophile would squeal over, clear bass that's not too heavy and crisp treble. They can definitely handle more if you use an equalizer.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Not a bad product, just not for me.
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, good sound
Cons: (personal) Fit
I was looking for a decent pair of headphones to use at work.
-It's quiet at work, so I didn't need noise cancellation. -It's quiet at work, so I didn't plan on blaring my music or pumping the bass.
I went to the store and tried them on and was pleased with how they felt. The following week or so I began disliking them more and more. I wear glasses and they were kind of tight on my head. The part over the head has no padding and can cause discomfort depending on where you place it on your head.
Overall, I was pleased with the sound for the price, and would recommend it to people who would use it for time spans under and hour.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Compact Design; Comfortable; Great Sound Quality
Sounds great. However, it does not fit my 8 year old's head. It's designed for a larger child or adult. It would be great if it could fit a young child's head.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellant sound for a great price
Item.Review:
Pros: sound reproduction
Cons: not very comfortable
Excellant sound quality, very good bass responce, very good price. These are not over the ear type phones, so they sit on top of your ears and there is no cushion on your ears, just the speaker grilles. Thus they are not very comfortable to wear for more than 2 hours. I use them mostly for gaming on my computer and are not very good for longtime play. My classic rock collection sounds excellant. I would recommend these to all listeners who are on a limited budget.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Lightweight; Comfortable; Good Value; Good Bass; Great Sound
[...]. I got them to use with my ipad2 so hi fidelity was not a real concern. I use them to watch tv and movies on it without disturbing others and some music that is on the iPad. For what I need and got them for, they sound great. I did not and would not buy them to use with an expensive stereo system looking for the highest fidelity. I am not comfortable with thosenin the ear types so they fit the bill.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Overall great sound and design
Cons: I've found no cons. No, that is not a con.
"You get what you pay for . . ." This is certainly a big exception. For just 19.99 you get natural bass, clean treble, and great mids. I primarily use this for my piano, when I don't want to disturb anyone, or for my computer. The headphones fit great - I am 13 and I was worried that they would be too large, but I've actually had to bump up the size on the sides to my surprise, so I'm sure they'll work for just about anybody. They look good, fold for portability, and if you're looking for an inexpensive solution, this is definitely the way to go.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Sound Quality; Comfortable; Easy To Use
Very good sound quality for the price. I will recommended it to anyone who is looking for quality at a decent price

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality
Cons: Comfort
This is a pretty good pair of headphones. I don't think they worth the price a paid. Maybe $5-10 cheaper would have been fairer for them. They have great sound quality. They aren't incredibly comfortable for very long for me. They work wonderfully for my son, fit his head very well, and he never complains about them hurting him. Other than being a little over priced, I think they are a good pair of headphones for short term useage.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Light weight, comfortable, and they work.
Item.Review:
Pros: The price
Cons: No downside
I love these head phones! The sound might not be air quality, but it is clear and concise and I can use them in comfort for extended periods of time. All of that, and inexpensive, too.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Product Review for Sony MDR-ZX100 Headphone - Stereo - Black - Mini-phone
Item.Review: I had these headphones for 2-3 weeks. I wear glasses, so it's rather uncomfortable to have this fit so tightly around the head. It can get really uncomfortable if your head is wide. The cushion of the headphone cup is also rather uncomfortable. But other than that, this headphone is really good for the price! I got it for $12, free shipping. :) Definitely worth the price. Love it so far. The sound quality isn't as good as I expected it to be though. If you can afford it, buy a more expensive headphones. If you're under budget, this is definitely a good starter headphones.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Price Point
Cons: Double Wire Design
These headphones are great for the price. Good sound and good comfort. have two wires, one coming from each ear piece, is somewhat annoying at times but not a huge issue. I do not wear them straight for long amounts of time but i do wear them for a few hours at a time and they remain comfortable. i normally have discomfort with all types of headphones but these are really comfortable at an affordable price.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Really comfortable, good sound quality
Although the headphones are inexpensive, do not underestimate them. The only thing that could be considered a downside is that they seem kind of fragile, but that goes for any pair of headphones out there. The good part is that if you get the Geek Squad Protection for a few bucks, it doesn't matter if you break them. Even if you don't, they don't cost an arm and a leg like others. They have great cushions on the ear pieces and are very comfortable. The size adjustments are good quality so that the don't move around when they are on your head. The best part is that the sound quality is really good. They can be turned up loud without people next to you being able to hear them and they do pretty well at keeping outside noises quiet. I prefer ... these over Beats any day. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review: I use these headphones for casual music listening. The fidelity, clarity and range are excellent and the set is very comfortable for extended use. They are not bulky or heavy like other headphones. I prefer these to ear buds. A great value.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: It's a great product for the money.
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
I have always loved sony products. This is no execption. I brought these headphones for my mother and she loves them. She cannot use earbuds so I was looking for a pair of headphones that were not only comfortable but reasonably priced. After trying some other brands I decided on the sony pair and I am very gad that I did.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Switching from WESC headphones. I'm liking these!
Item.Review:
Pros: EXCELLENT QUALITY for $20.
Cons: Meh bass. Not very comfortable.
For $20, these are a great choice for anyone looking for headphones with great quality. Looking for good bass? Don't buy these then. When I first put them on, I found them VERY uncomfortable but I got used to it after a while. Disappointing there's no soft padding anywhere. Sometimes these have even slipped out of my ears o_0 This looks is pretty nice, simple design, but not bad looking at all.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Cons: looks
the top plastic on the headphones are uncomfortable. not a noise canceling item. the sound of the music is average. if your looking for simple headphones for a low price. this would be it. i wish i wouldn't have taken so long to use them (it is too late for me to return them now. it has now become part of stuff in the garage for future donation).

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: price, durability, size
Cons: middle of the road sound quality (not bad, not great)
I walk to work and for most places around town so I like to listen to my iPod. I tried serveral earbud style headphones (including one that cost $50) and couldn't find a decent pair. I could either barely even hear them or the sound quality was just so horrible that I'd rather listen to the traffic going by. I really liked my studio headphone (and still do at home), but their large size got kind of awkward. I saw these for $15 and I figure what the heck. I was plesently surprised with how decent they are. They still don't sound very good when compaired to studio headphones, but they are great for the size and especially price. Both high and low ends don't sound that great, but very good ... for the price. I would recommend chekcing these out if you use them for walking and are sick and tired of earbuds like I was. If you plan to use them at home (size isn't an issue) pay a little more and you can do a lot better. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review: I use it with my computer and my iPhone to ear music and movies. It has a great bass / general sound and you can ear barely nothing from outside. The bad thing is it is not so comfortable as professional headphones. Take into account the price, I think this headphones are great for indoor usage in periods not larger than ~2 hours.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Good Intro over the ear cans ...
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
Cons: Would like a bit longer cord
For the price, you can't beat them !! Good sound quality, lows and highs are not muffled at all. I have used them with my iPod, MiniDisc player, home stereo system and with a portable cd player and have been impressed with both the comfortable wearing I get after long periods of wearing them and the clarity at all volume levels.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Outstanding for it's price and intent!
Item.Review:
Pros: Outstanding sound. Superior quality for the price.
Cons: I keep getting the wires caught on things. Not the product's fault.
If you are bothered by noises around you while you are listening to your music, pay more and get a noise cancelling headset. If you want professional sound from your headset, fork out the bucks and get a professional set of headphones. You get what you pay for. Sony produced an outstanding set of headphones for the bucks. I'm NOT saying these are cheap sounding or cheap quality. What I am saying is you WILL get your money's worth and then some with this headphone. I need a set of headphones that I can hear through because of my lifestyle. I also enjoy quality sound from my headphone. I want to hear the triangles, the harp, the flute and piccolo, a ... s well as the bass, kettle drum, and trumpet. With these headphones, I can hear all this as well as keep an awareness of what is going on in my shop or home.
If you want to compare quality, do it with a comparatively priced set of headphones. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, and comfortability
Cons: Vocals, and bass.
I bought these headphones for daughter to use when watching videos on my ipad. When my daily headphones shorted out I used them for a week. These headphones are OK, the bass isn't the best, and voices are low when listening to a podcast or audio book. The ear phones look good and are very comfortable. During the week I used them they began to short out a little on the right side. So overall these are an average pair headphones and are good for the price.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound Quality and low price
Cons: Cord can come loose easily
I got these a couple of days back, and wow they are great. The sound quality is great and for 20 dollars, thats simply awesome.
However it doesn't completely fit around your ear, making it seem like the Sahara desert in there. Another thing is that just with a tiny tug the plug will come loose and its cord isn't very long.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: Won't stay in ears, doesn't cancel noise or improve sound
I bought these for a flight for Paris. Unfortunately, I didn't try them before getting on the plane. They wouldn't stay in my ears. I couldn't tell the difference between the on or off position, in terms of noise reduction/canceling. I bought them based on the reviews and the Sony name, but wish I'd bought the Bose headphones instead.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Sound
Cons: The cord could be a little longer
I got these headphones for $19.99. While they do not kick out as much base as Dr. Dre BeatsAudio headphone...I feel they are a much better value than the aforementioned $199.99 headphones. This pair of SONY headphones has great sound and they are very comfortable.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Product Review for Sony MDR-ZX100 Headphone - Stereo - Black - Mini-phone
Item.Review: These headphones are great. I use them when I make beats and I can hear everything as clear as if I ran the sound through my main speakers. There is just enough bass to make these headphones great for in the studio.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Uncomfortable after wearing a few hours.
Item.Review:
Pros: price, sound quality
Cons: Ears sore after a few hours
Quite simply, there are better headphones out there. No real reason to buy these. I've learned from all my headphone buying escapades, that there are only two types worth buying: Ear bud headphones and full ear covering headphones. I have a $50 pair of over the ear headphones and a love em!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Just what I was looking for
Item.Review: I wanted a headphone set that would block some background noise, be a light but snug fit and most of all, have great sound quality. This fits the bill. Also shipped very quickly.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Worth buying if you are not looking to spend $$$
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, sound and comfort
Cons: a little bulky
Great set of headphones for the price. We bought a pair of these to take on a trip to Hawaii and they worked great. Granted, they are not comparable to the Bose Quiet Comfort series but they cost about 95% less

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Terrible fit & comfort! Sound cuts out!
Item.Review:
Pros: Low price
Cons: Head band too rigid, sound is poor!
The head band is way too rigid, and actually hurt the top of my head... people have different shapes & sizes of heads, it needs to be flexible to conform to the skull & hair! Also, the left ear kept cutting off, I'd have to pull the jack out and plug it back in to get the sound back on, and even then it wasn't very good sound quality! Returned these after 2 weeks of extreme disappointment! Even though it was a low price... it's not worth half that amount!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: good price
These headphones have a great sound quality and can produce much louder music than most headphones of similar price. Way better than earbuds, which cost about the same

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review: I have to have over the head earpiece because most earplugs won't stay in my ear. These are great. They fit on your head without being too snug, and the sound is pretty clear as well.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: OK for the VERY low price...
Item.Review:
Pros: very low price
Cons: Noise cancelling
These sound very good for the money. There are not many over-ear to choose from among the non-junk. I tend to gravitate toward SONY products as I have had great luck with them...so I gave these a try specifically for a flight to FL. They were comfortable for long term use, the sound was good, but they dont serve for much in the way of noise-cancelling. The cord is great. Did not tangle once. Overall, I would recommend them, but I have not tried any others in this price range in comparison.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Good price for value
Cons: Had to get a replacement pair
I had my headphones shipped to the Best Buy store in the mall. They sounded good until about 2 minutes. The sound coming out was distored. I took them back to get an exchange the next day. I was leery of getting a replacement Sony pair, but turns out the second pair work fine. Obviously the first pair were defective.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: low price and comfort
Cons: sound is not as good as the $150-250 headphones.. obviously.
looking at headphones, the prices range from $20 to $400. For the cheapest over the ear headphones, they are sufficient. I use it for listening to my computer when my girlfriend is watching TV program I am not interested in.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Comfortable; Great Sound Quality
I bought this for my daughter, she uses it for her mp3 player. I tried them my self and they sound really good. I would by another pair.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: good value
Cons: if you want good sound you need to spend more money
adequate sound for small price. good utility for listening in one room without bothering others in neighboring rooms

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: cost
These were a stocking stuffer to go with my daughter's laptop. She loves them. Uses them all of the time. I am a little more picky about my stuff. For the money, they sound great. If you want great sound be prepaired to spend a little more.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: low price
Cons: comfort
These sony head phones are very bad. I say that because they are terrible on ear. The ear pieces are pretty hard and for me i don't approve of that. The price is pretty low and I know a lot of people that have these head phones but I don't like them. They tell me they are all right. I can see that due to the price but their sound isn't that bad but the fact that the ear pieces aren't comfortable it just ruins the sound, it makes me want to take them off right that second and call it a day. I will let this product slide due to the price, but if you really care about sound and comfort I say NO!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
I use these mostly at work when I'm at my desk, they were priced right and the sound quality is great. I've even ran with them connected to my Ipod and they are nice and snug.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Very durable
Cons: Poor sound quality
I'm really puzzled how other people who reviewed here can describe the sounds quality of this headphones as 'Good'. Its sounds like those cheap headphones they give in-flight by the airlines. Its has no bass response! I have seen much better quality in cheaper headphones than this. The only thing that I would describe as 'Good' with these headphone is they are made very sturdy and durable. So don't expect any quality sound when you buy these!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Great sound, low cost.
Cons: The band can look a little funny depending on the shape of your head.
I was pretty skeptical about $20 headphones, even from Sony. These are great headphones though! I use them almost every day while I'm working and they are really comfortable. The cord doesn't tangle and is long enough for you to put your music player in your pants pocket. The jack fits my iPhone nicely, even with a Magpul case on it.
Really the best part of these is the sound quality though. I couldn't believe how good they sound! Even if I don't use any EQ settings on my iPhone these sound amazing. Great range no matter what you listen to. I listen to everything from podcasts to Eminem to All That Remains and it all sounds excellent. Even though I would love a pair ... of Beats headphones I really can't see paying the premium when I got these for a fraction of the cost and if I leave them somewhere or someone steals them I'm not crushed.
Also, get the replacement plan. My total was about $27 out the door and even if I cut through the cord at work I get a free replacement for two years. Can't beat that deal! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, quality of sound, comfortable
Cons: Cord not long as it should be.
These are great for the price! They look good, they feel good, and most importantly they sound good. I am sure "beats by dre" sound better, but for the price, no way! These are more than suffice for the average user. I just wish the cord was longer.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Great headphones for the price it going for
Item.Review:
Pros: rich sound for a not so rich price
Cons: nothing
Theses are exceptional headphones for just 20.00. Over the ear are already better for your ears than ear buds, but the fact that the wire is thicker, for less chances of ripping off and more commonly, getting shorts, and the comfortable cushion for the ears for long lasting usage, 20 dollars for theses will last way longer than any other headphones this our lower price

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Comfortable; Easy To Use
Cons: Cord too short; Poor Sound Quality
I bought these headphones for the office. I just wanted to listen to simple webcasts/podcasts, nothing that would be of exceptional recorded quality. So I thought a cheap pair of headphones would be good for me. These headphones are cheap, and they don't work. Maybe I just got a dud, but I can't use these because everytime I move the sound cuts out. If I just swivel in my chair, reach across my desk, or use my mouse the sound breaks up. Often I have to pick up the cord and jiggle it to get the sound back. These have to be a dud, because I can't see how others could get headphones like this and be happy or even OK with them. Also yes I think the cord is too short, even for just sitting at my desk and tryin ... g to do office work.Oh, and the final Con: when the product shipped in to my office someone else opened them and discared all the packaging and paper work. So I know I cannot return them. So being out the [$] makes it just a little more sucky. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Great Sound Quality; Comfortable
I'm using the headphone for Djing. The pivoting earpieces work perfectly for mixing & cueing up the next track.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: You do get sweaty ears after a few hours...
I absolutely love these headphones! The thick cord helps so that it doesn't get tangled up, even if I have them rolled up and in my pocket. I love the sound. It feels like I'm right in front of the stage at a concert to me. What I love the most about them is how they've survived so far. The speakers turning facing out is good for me because its easy to put into mu backpack. The cord hasn't snapped, the headset hasn't broken, the foam coverings haven't come off. These headphones are perfect for my life.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Cons: the sound is weeeeaaakkkk! the bass is almost non- exhistent.my ear get hot after a while.
nothing special. I saw that over the ears were making a come back. So i decided to get some. I am listening to to Linkin Park on pandora right now as i write and the bass is lost. I have been listening for about 25 minutes and my ears are hot. The Sound.UGHHHH! You know how some people are Apple. I am a Sony. I've owned Sony CDMAN,DVD,TV, mobile phone,PS3,PSP, numerous headphones and earphones and I writing on my Sony Vaio. Sony you dinged my heart with this one!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Low price
Cons: Sound quality isn't too great but that's to be expected with a low-end product
Good product for a great value. The sound quality isn't that great but it's pretty good for the price.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Great head set for the sale price. No Dre thump
Item.Review:
Pros: light and versitil enough to use at work while on the computer
Cons: Does not overlap ear to block ambient noise but for the price it is great.
Great head set for the salesprice. No Dr. Dre thump, but easy to store and pull out for use. I plug in my Blackberry and I touch with no problems. I prefer over the ear padded headset over something inside my ear canal.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: isolate a little
Cons: Low sound and little bass
Well, when i bought these headphones I wasn't to sure to expect. So I kept the case, for just in case. I really enjoy the headphones.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Comfortable
Cons: Cord Too Short; Falls Off/Out Of Ear
I use it with my tablet and iphone. The sound is ok not great, maybe it's was the price range. The head phones are heavy, and keep falling off.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Value; Lightweight; Comfortable; Great Sound
These worked great for me, while we traveled this summer. I could play and hear my games over the car noise. It does not have noise cancelling but They seemed to cut out other noises.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality & price.
Cons: Minimal noise cancelling abilities.
I bought these headphones for my 8 year old to use with our portable DVD player in our truck. The reality is that I use them often myself too. The headphone cushion is soft and supple like bose and the build quality of the cable and headphones are fantastic. I had a coupon and got these for $17 and it was one of my best purchases all year. If you need headphones to use in your house or on the go especially if its with an ipod or ipad then these are perfect. There are no noise canceling qualities so if you need that for a train or plane ride then you have to spend ten times as much for bose or beats. Overall, you won't be dissapointed. I got these in black but they make them in pink and white as well which ma ... kes it nice for girls and boys. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Good features and price
I needed new headphones for use with my MP3 player and occasionally my computer after my cat chewed the cords on my old ones. I like the sound, feel and cord length of these headphones. And I'm keeping them away from my cat.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Comfortable; Lightweight; Great Sound; Good Value; Durable
I still use my Sony Walkman with a Casette! The earphones broke in two. [...] I replaced the headset with these [...] and I'm completely satisfied.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Value; Great Sound
Cons: Uncomfortable
These are very narrow and i find them quite uncomfortable. I should have sprung for the Memorex noise-cancelling headphones (that i already have a pair of and LOVE).

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality, AMAZING price
Cons: There kind of quite
Ok, so there not Beats or anything like that, but if you want good headphones that will last a while then these are for you. The sound quality is way above what these headphones cost and the base is amazing! I use them everywhere and I have no complaints about their durabilty. For only 20 bucks, your buying 100 dollar headphones thats for sure,

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound, Price
Cons: Comfort
For your money, these sound all-around like more expensive headphones. In that aspect they are a good value, but the earpads are stiff and for me were very uncomfortable.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review: I got these headphones for $20 and have used them for about a month now, I must say that the quality that you get out of this product is worth much more than the $20 price tag! No matter where I use these the sound quality is crisp, clear, and loud enough not to disturb anyone around me! Sony has really put another quality product onto the market with this newest edition of stereo headphones!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: it works
Cons: It amplifies outside sound
When I use these headphones at my health club, they amplify the surrounding noise. I will never buy this product again.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Headphones that don't give me a headache
Item.Review:
Pros: They are so comfortable and soft.
Cons: They are a little much to carry around when compared to the earbuds.
The earbuds were giving me a headache, but these headphones are so soft and comfortable that I'm glad I bought them. I can use the earbuds for a short time, but these headphones are so soft and so much more comfortable and the sound seems better, too.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Product Review for Sony MDR-ZX100 Headphone - Stereo - Black - Mini-phone
Item.Review: I listened to these right after listening to Beats by Dr. Dre and these sounded almost as much! You will not find a better pair of headphones fotlr this price. Great job SONY and keep impressing!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Product Review for Sony MDR-ZX100 Headphone - Stereo - Black - Mini-phone
Item.Review: I love these headphones, i have bose earbuds and after wearing them they bother my ears a little so i bought these and wow i did not expect such good sound out of 19.99 headphones what a great product. They have the same if not better base than the bose buds, which were 99.99 they are comfortable for long periods of music listening or video editing. the longest i have worn the headphones was about 5 hrs and no discomfort. Stylish looking i can wear them around my neck in public and have people ask what headphones they are because they look nice, and when i show them how they sound and tell them the price they cant believe it. i recommend them to everyone as a inexpensive great pare of headphones, i don't see where you could get a better deal 5 star A+

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Cons: the cord is too short!
I usually use these headphones at my desk and everytime I move in my chair the headphones get yanked off. I will probably have to invest in some headphones with a longer cord in the near future. They are decent for the price though.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review: I haven't used these in the field yet but so far they are comfortable and work well at the computer. The sound is clear and the adjust well to my pinhead! they keep the sound from driving my co-workers crazy when I'm editing. They don't fold up to stow them in my backpack.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: They're extremely comfortable to me.
Cons: Haven't had any issues yet.
Love them! They're extremely comfortable and lightweight. So far, I haven't had any problems with them and the sound is good. Of course, I could test them better if I had some premium sound speakers to listen with. HAHA

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: The best sound.
These headphones have an excellent sound and they are very comfortable. I use them at the gym and at home I can compare them with a pair of a hundred dollars headphones and I would not notice the difference when it comes to sound.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: The cost
Cons: Nothing thus far
Sony has always done me right. I purchased these headphones for use with my Ipod Touch. Wow! For $20 it dont get no better!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: price and durability
Just needed a basic pair of head phones that are meant to be used by the entire family. My kids have a tendency to treat headphones roughly. The sound quality is only fair if you're an audiophile hoping to use to listen to high fidelity music, but if looking for a durable and inexpensive pair of headphones for everyday use, look no further.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: The sound is great & light wieght.
Item.Review:
Pros: Would buy again
Cons: None
It has great sound with the volume turn down or turned up high no desorsion. It light wieght not over sized. Keeps the sound contain that other don't hear it.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review: I use these headphones with a splitter to give the client an opportunity to monitor the talent as we record. These headphones feel cheap - sound is just okay. Next time I will spend a little extra a get a better pair.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review: I've been swearing by this line of headphones for years now ever since they were recommended by my radio production instructor back in the day. They're probably not the greatest studio headphones you could get but they do the job well and for way less cash. They are comfortable and the sound quality is great. They don't cancel out all noise but for a casual user it's more than enough. These days I use them with my ipod and laptop and I still do a little music editing here and there but nothing beyond basic. There was a change between this model and the old one I had originally; the cord is a little thinner and a lot shorter now but this would only be a gripe of mine if I still did studio work. I could see it not being long enough now to allow you to move around while still wearing and get ... to different parts of the sound board or other equipment. This is not an issue for me these days though so I'm good. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Packs easy
You can't beat the price and the value you get. I used them on a trip to the East coast and back including an 18 hour travel time and they were still comfortable at the end of the trip.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Good price, good sound, light on your ears
Cons: Nothing as of now
I got this as a gift for my husband, whose previous Sony headphones were falling apart because he used them so much. He uses these headphones every day and loves them. They have a good sound and seem to last a long time. It was a good buy.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: You don't have to spend alot to hear wel
Item.Review:
Pros: Comfortable head piece; Comfortable; Great Sound Quality
Cons: Short cord
I like the shorter cord because I don't get caught in it or trip on it. Others may want the extra movement.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Cons: No Bass!
I Bought These Cuz Alot Of People Have Them At My School BCCHS, And Sinse I Had dr.dre beats Already, i wanted to see how good they were. NO BASS! I Love Bass And These Head Phones had No Bass. im just sticking wit Beats by dre now those have deep bass.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Inexpensive
Just got them so can't say much for the durability. They do feel durable though. They sound great for the money and the fitment isn't bad either.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: price
Cons: nothing really
I take long trips to Jacksonville in a car. While im the passenger I will watch dvd movies on a small player. These headphones were not bad at all. They cut out most of the background noise and for the most part were pretty comfortable. Overall great for the price. Can't beat it. I would recommend to a friend.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: excellent quality, great sound, noise reduction
Cons: standard length cord - wish it was longer
love these headphones - purchased for recording music and they work like a dream! Crystal clear sound! They are noise cancelling, so you only hear the music. Love them!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Comfortable on my ears.
Cons: A little bulky
The Sony headphones are comfortable, but a little bulky. I hate anything that hurts my ears, and these don't, but if I use them when sleeping, which I do often, they are a little bulky and hard to sleep on my side.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Utility
Cons: Price
I found this product useful to practice for the Internet-based TOEFL examination. It was a little awkward to put on the headset. The price seemed to be high for this product.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: These headphones have been my favorite so far
Item.Review:
Pros: the comfort and sound
Cons: n/a
The headphones have been my favorite out of all of the headphones I have purchased in the past- and trust me I have went through a lot of headphones. These are comfortable, durable, sounds fantastic and fits well. Would not trade them for any other

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Great over the ear Head phones.
Item.Review:
Pros: More comfortable than ear buds
Cons: Cord could be 6 inches longer.
Great Head Phones for those of us old timers that prefer over the ear to ear buds. It fits my Nano connection, my PC and my Tablet. The only grip is that the cord could be another 3 to 6 inches longer.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Product Review for Sony MDR-ZX100 Headphone - Stereo - Black - Mini-phone
Item.Review: This set of headphones has good sound to listen. The size of the cord is a little short, but does not bother me. Overall I would recommend this product to anyone who wants good quality headphones.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Thumping bass, crystal clear sound, built to last
Cons: A little too big
I use these both for my computer and my iPod, got em today, they have to be the best headphones i've ever had. I still can't believe they were only $19.99 though these things are worth a lot more than that.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: great priced headphones and sound quality
Item.Review:
Pros: good price and great sound
Cons: cord is a little too short
for only $20.00 or around that range plus a great sound system in the headphones even though the cord is a little too short but it's a great product to get great quality and price at the same time.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review: Right out of the package, you may feel these headphones are constructed with a lot of plastic - and these phones are. But, if you're looking for a pair of guest phones for podcasting or other gaming or non-critical audio sampling, you can't beat these SONY MDR-ZX100 phones.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: they're... not uncomfortable?
Cons: everything else
It somehow manages to augment the noise outside the headphones. I can hold a conversation as easily with these on as without, car-on-pavement sounds seem louder when I'm wearing the headphones whan they do without. Playing violin is actively painful with them on (useful to play along with a recording of a difficult passage). This is one of the few products I've ever been disappointed enough with to return.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: It fits very comfortable on my ears
Cons: I can still hear some things outside of the headphones
All in all the Sony Headphones are a great product and I hear music very clear and crisp. I hear things in songs that I hadn't heard before.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Solid headphones for a great price!
Item.Review: The sound is obviously not going to compare to hundred dollar mixing headphones, but for twenty dollars, it definitely holds up, and this is coming from someone who is quite obsessive about sound quality. I listen to my iPod at least once a day and I have not had any complaints about these headphones yet. Also, they are very durable. I commute to school three times a week, and I can throw them into my bag without any worry about what condition they'll be in when I take them out. Really satisfied with this purchase.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: Lotsa things
Cheap headphones are cheap. I thought I'd get lucky, but nah. They're not bad, but they're definitely not good. My ears hurt after wearing them for a half hour. Music sounds flat. I listen to electronic music, and these do nothing for me. The cable and plug are big and bulky. These would be great for public use, discouraging prolonged use.
I'd rather just use my laptop's speakers than wear these.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Comfort,Sound Quality,Price
Cons: nothing so far
They are very comfortable great sound quality im very please definitely buy these they are great for the price!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Comfortable; Easy To Use; Great Sound Quality
We use these mostly for computer so everyone in the house doesnt have to listen to music or movies. They work really well for this purpose and are comfy to wear for the whole movie.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
For all the other reviewers that claimed this headphone is not good, please describe of how you use it for and what is the component the headphone connected to.
I connected it to my PC and it sounded very good, but when I connected it to my android phone with downloaded EQ apps at custom set, the headphone just EXPLODED with music superbly, deep BASS, clear mid range and highs, sound resonance, etc - for $20 (please read "TWENTY DOLLARS") ..............this thing is scary GOOD, CANNOT be beat - even by Dr DRE beats HP:)

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: comfort
First purchased similar $30 model in Skull candy brand but found they slid around on my ears a bit and bugged me. I returned those and got these Sony headphones and they are so comfortable to me I forget I have them on. I am not a fancy pants high end audio person by any means, but for all around general video music listening on you tube they rock!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Lack of comfort ruined it for me.
Item.Review:
Pros: Price and Quality
Cons: Causes discomfort
Bought the headphones on sale and after the first hour of use, realized just how tight of a fit they were around my ears. I don't have large ears but boy did they start to hurt the longer I wore them. I don't have any other complaints about the headphones but the discomfort makes it very difficult for me to use them regularly and enjoy them.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: sound quality
Cons: size and fitting may not be for evedyone
They seem to be bigger thab the model theyre replacing for Sony but they sound just as good!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: price
Cons: the sound quality is good but I think it can be improve
These are a pair of good headphones for those who are looking for cheap headphones with a decent sound quality.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Sound for Good Price
Cons: Short cord
These headphones are used everyday by both My Sons and so far they have held up Very Well. I use them at least 4 or 5 times a week and they seem to work good for Me, I listen to a lot of different kinds of Music.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: I'm very happy with my new headphones.
Item.Review:
Pros: Very Comfortable
I have tried quite a few sets of head phones and so far, these are the best. Usually my ears get soar after the first CD or so, but not with these. Thanks!!

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Comfortable; Lightweight; Great Sound; Durable; Good Bass; Good Value
I use for listening to audio books while walking, riding the stationery bicycle and any other time I possibly can.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:

I bought this head phone 2-3 days ago and its really great, the sound quality and base effect is good for what you are paying.You can buy this for 20$ its worth buying.

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
Item.Review:

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black

Item.Item: Sony MDR ZX100/BLK - headphones - Ear-cup, Binaural - Black
